Title: Alma C. Wilson to Stjørdalen Sparebank 1948.3.16
Description:
BLÅPAPIR-KOPI AV ET BREV SKREVET AV ALMA WILSON, PÅ VEGNE AV SIN MOR, TIL STJØRDALEN SPAREBANK, DATERT 16. MARS – 1948.

CARBON COPY OF A LETTER WRITTEN BY ALMA WILSON, ON BEHALF OF HER MOTHER, TO STJØRDALEN SPAREBANK (SAVINGS BANK), DATED MARCH 16 - 1948.
Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Dell rapids S.D.  March 16-48

Stjørdalen Sparebank

Ærede Herrer  Jeg hermed skriver dere for at faa vide hvor mange penger, det nu er i min mand John Holm sit navn der.

og hvad papir trenges for at trekke dem ud af banken der

Svar med luft post er di snild

Gi ikke dise penger til nogen før du skriver og faar svar herfra  sig hvor meget det er i Amerikanske daler, samt i norske kroner

Erbødigst

Mrs. John Holm,

102 West 5 Street

Dell Rapids,

South Dakota

Dell Rapids S.D. March 16-48

Stjørdalen Sparebank

Honorable Gentlemen  I’m hereby writing you in order to find out how much money, there now is in my husband John Holm’s name there.

and what paper is needed to withdraw them from the bank there

Reply by air mail please

Do not give this money to anybody until you write and get a reply from here

tell me how much it is in American dollars, as well as in Norwegian kroner

Sincerely

Mrs. John Holm,

102 West 5 Street

Dell Rapids

South Dakota
